name: Puzzle Box 3 in 1
description:
Puzzle Box 3 in 1 is a small puzzle collection of the top trending puzzle games.

In Puzzle Box you swipe up numbered blocks in a row to merge same numbers up or you add or subtract numbers to match the same numbers in a grid of blocks in merge plus. And in connect the dots you connect the same color with a line without crossing another one.

Enjoy!
intro: Add up same numbers and connect the dot puzzle games
